{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = GL.iNet GL-AX1800.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Secure & Powerful Wi-Fi 6 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.gl-inet.com/products/gl-ax1800/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-AX1800 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (Flint) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-AX1800 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ6000; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz 1.2 GHz (+ 1x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = ESMT;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E4:95:6E |oui = E4:95:6E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, MU-MIMO, DBDC, OFDMA, |addchip = <!-- 2.4GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4200;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4550;;2; --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/10/2021 |estreldate = 09/2021 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09HBW45ZJ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 210 x 120 x 36.8 mm |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5022; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5022; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|GL.iNet}}
===Specification=== *CPU: IPQ6000 @1.2GHz (Quad-core ARM) :NPU (Networking Processing Unit): @1.5GHz *Memory/Storage: 512MB (DDR3L)/128MB (NAND) *Wi-Fi protocol: 802.11abgn/ac/ax (2T2R) AX1800 :Speed: 600Mbps (2.4GHz), 1200Mbps (5GHz) *Antennas: 4x external antennas *Ethernet Ports: 5x 10/100/1000Mbps *Dimension: 210 x 120 x 36.8 mm
==See also== :;[[GL.iNet]] • [https://www.gl-inet.com/products/ Products] *[[GL.iNet GL-AX1800]] (Flint) • [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/gl-inet-ax1800-new-router-openwrt-support/105163 OpenWrt] :FCC ID: 2AFIW-AX1800 (2021-11-10) *[[GL.iNet GL-B2200]] (Velica) :''Tri-band Wireless Gigabit Router'' :FCC ID: 2AFIW-B2200 (2020-10-21) *[[GL.iNet GL-B1300]] (Convexa-B) :FCC ID: 2AFIW-GLB1300 (01/19/18) *[[GL.iNet GL-S1300]] (Convexa-S) :FCC ID: 2AFIW-S1300 (04/30/2019) *[[GL.iNet GL-MV1000 (Brume)]] :FCC ID: 2AFIW-MV1000W (2019-12-10) *[[GL.iNet GL-MT1300]] (AC1300) :FCC ID: 2AFIW-MT1300 (2020-10-21) *[[GL.iNet GL-SF1200]] (Meet) • [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/how-do-gl-inet-devices-become-supported-by-official-openwrt-releases/103883 OpenWrt] :CPU: ''SiFlower'' SF19A2890 @800MHz :Dual-core MIPS (2C4T) WiSoC [https://post.m.smzdm.com/p/a5d3ko2x/ (2T2R)] :FCC ID: 2AFIW-SF1200 (2021-12-02) *[[GL.iNet GL-SFT1200]] - Travel Router :FCC ID: 2AFIW-SFT1200 (2021-12-07)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
